text: Nadir Tedeschi (11 August 1930 â€“ 9 August 2021) was an Italian politician. Tedeschi was born in Badia Polesine, Italy. He was a member of the Christian Democracy Party. He was first elected to the Chamber of Deputies in 1976. He won a second term in 1983 and left office in 1987. Tedeschi died in Trezzano sul Naviglio, Italy on 9 August 2021, just two days before his 91st birthday. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Veneto
title: Nadir Tedeschi
